        Gets Value of the Counter
        Parameters:
        counterID - CounterID of the Counter

      • getGeofenceCounterValue

        public int getGeofenceCounterValue(int minor)
                            throws RestClientException
        Gets the value of the Counter from the Geofence. Only usable if only one Counter is assigned to the Geofence. I.e. with GeofenceCounterEvent.
        Returns:
        Value of the counter
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs

      • removeCounter

        public boolean removeCounter(int counterID)
                      throws RestClientException
        Removes Counter
        Parameters:
        counterID - CounterID of the Counter
        Returns:
        true if counter removed, false if not
        Throws:
        RestClientException - with ErrorCode if a problem occurs
